content: **crochet bag / clutch in drops cotton viscose or safran and bomull-lin ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** diameter approx 12 cm height approx 17 cm **materials** drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 100 g colour no 01 white or use drops safran from garnstudio 100 g colour no 17 white and use drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 100 g colour no 02 off-white drops crochet hook size 3 mm - or size needed to obtain 20 double_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 with 1 thread of each yarn quality drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g - or size needed to obtain 17 double_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 with 1 thread of each yarn quality
